title: GSOC 2026 Application Form

fields.name: projectDescription
fields.label: Project Description
fields.placeholder: Describe your project idea in detail

fields.name: technologyStack
fields.label: Technology Stack
fields.placeholder: Add relevant technologies (e.g., Python, JavaScript, React)

fields.name: expectedTimeline
fields.label: Expected Timeline (Weeks)
fields.placeholder: Select the expected project duration in weeks

fields.name: priorExperience
fields.label: Prior Experience
fields.placeholder: Describe your experience related to this project

fields.name: organizationPreference
fields.label: Preferred Organization
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the organization you prefer (optional)

fields.name: agreeToTerms
fields.label: I agree to the GSOC terms and conditions

prompt: create a form for GSOC requirements 2026
